text:

web browser through apache, I get the error.

I changed APACHE_HOME/bin/envvars to include LD_LIBRARY_PATH, and when I do 
phpinfo(); it shows apache environment LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/lib/oracle/10.2.0.3
